title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes.
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: They wereassembled in a large open plain, called Upsettlington, opposite the castle ofNorham, but on the northern or Scottish side of the river.

title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: They were assembled in alarge open place, called Upsettlington, opposite to theCastle of Norham, but on the northern or Scottishside of the river.
